description: Gets information about an existing Amazon Q Business index.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business application connected to the index.

parameters.name: indexId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business index you want information on.

nested_items.name: applicationId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business application associated with the index.

nested_items.name: indexId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business index.

nested_items.name: displayName
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon Q Business index.

nested_items.name: indexArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Q Business index.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the index. When the value is ACTIVE, the index is ready for use. If the Status field value is FAILED, the ErrorMessage field contains a message that explains why.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of index attached to your Amazon Q Business application.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description for the Amazon Q Business index.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the Amazon Q Business index was created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the Amazon Q Business index was last updated.

nested_items.name: capacityConfiguration
nested_items.description: The storage capacity units chosen for your Amazon Q Business index.

nested_items.name: units
nested_items.description: The number of storage units configured for an Amazon Q Business index.

nested_items.name: documentAttributeConfigurations
nested_items.description: Configuration information for document attributes or metadata. Document metadata are fields associated with your documents. For example, the company department name associated with each document. For more information, see Understanding document attributes.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the document attribute.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of document attribute.

nested_items.name: search
nested_items.description: Information about whether the document attribute can be used by an end user to search for information on their web experience.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The message explaining the Amazon Q Business request error.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The code associated with the Amazon Q Business request error.

nested_items.name: indexStatistics
nested_items.description: Provides information about the number of documents indexed.

nested_items.name: textDocumentStatistics
nested_items.description: The number of documents indexed.

nested_items.name: indexedTextBytes
nested_items.description: The total size, in bytes, of the indexed documents.

nested_items.name: indexedTextDocumentCount
nested_items.description: The number of text documents indexed.
